name: Mortal Kombat Reborn
description:
This project is my old idea to make mortal kombat more interesting. I am going to go crazy with this and make new abilities, finishing system and make them more unique. What I did for now:
- Hell arena

- numpud keys and arrows for base movement and punches

- Freeze: down, forward, LP.   
- Ground freeze: down, back, LP.
- Slide: back, back, LK.
- Fatality: back, back, LP.

- throwing: back, LP (very close)

- combo: HP, LP, HP (very close)

I will appreciate any feedback or any ideas.
